text: The 1940 Tennessee gubernatorial election was held on November 5, 1940. Incumbent Democrat Prentice Cooper defeated Republican nominee C. Arthur Bruce with 72.09% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== *Prentice Cooper, Democratic *C. Arthur Bruce, Republican ===Results=== ==References== 1940 Tennessee Gubernatorial
title: 1940 Tennessee gubernatorial election
